attributes.action: Create NVQs for vegetarian and vegan cooking
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many vegetarian and vegan schoolchildren attend Catering taster days at their local college in the hope of persuing a career in the kitchen - only to find that carving/gutting meat and fish are compulsory parts of the course . This petition asks the Prime Minister to create seperate NVQs in vegan and vegetarian cooking.
